overview: The world is full of beautiful people. As gay men, we have an instinct for the appreciation of beauty--especially male beauty! All of us have turned our heads as we walk by a gorgeous man, allowing our eyes to linger a moment longer while our inner smiles beam with pleasure. Striking chiseled features, brilliant blue eyes, a chest that heaves with masculinity, a mouth framed by inviting, kissable lips...these are the things that arouse us all. Mankind is our candy store, and gay men like it sweet!
title: Bedroom Eyes
